 CERTIFICATIONS
 PROJECTS
1. ClipLine
    * Website: https://clipline.com
    * Position: Senior RoR Developer
    * Description: A website for training staffs by video to improve business
performance. Staff will watch business videos, practice and make a video
for manager review.
    * Techniques:
            - Back-end: Ruby on Rails
            - Front-end: ReactJS
            - DBMS: PostgreSQL
2. ETVOX - LEEAD
    * Position: Senior RoR Developer 
    * Description: A website for manage projects, staffs, cost of projects .... 
    * Techniques: 
            - Back-end: Ruby on Rails 
            - Front-end: ReactJS
            - DBMS: MySQL
3. 4travel
     * Website: http://4travel.jp
     * Position: Senior RoR Developer
     * Description: A website for reviewing the trips. 
     * Techniques: 
            - Back-end: Ruby on Rails 
            - Front-end: HTML, CSS, Javascript 
            - DBMS: MySQL
4. Mery
    * Website: https://mery.jp
    * Position: RoR Developer 
    * Description: A website for selling clothers for girls.
    * Techniques:
             - Back-end: Ruby on Rails
             - Front-end: HTML, CSS, Javascript
             - DBMS: MySQL
5. Agento
    * Position:       RoR Developer (Backend, APIs)
    * Duration:       About 3 months 
    * Description:  A mobile app for buying/senlling/renting house
    * Techniques:  
           - Back-end:   Ruby on Rails, Websocket
           - Front-end:   HTML, CSS, Bootstrap,...
           - DBMS:         MySQL
           - Platform:     Linux, Ruby 1.9.3, Rails 4.1.4
6. SnappCV 
    * Position:        RoR Developer (Backend, APIs)
    * Duration:       About 2 months
    * Description:  A mobile app for create Curriculum Vitae (CV) and Jobs
    * Techniques:  
            - Back-end:   Ruby on Rails
            - Front-end:  HTML, CSS, Bootstrap,...
            - DBMS:        PostgreSQL
            - Platform:    Linux, Ruby 1.9.3, Rails 4
7. Bidcarros
    * Position:        PHP Developer
    * Duration:        About 3 months
    * Description:   A website for buying/selling cars
    * Website:         http://bidcarros.rubyspace.net
    * Techniques:   
            - CMS:           Drupal
            - Back-end:    PHP
            - Front-end:   HTML, CSS, Bootstrap,JQuery,... 
            - DBMS:         MySQL 
            - Platform:     Linux
8. Mindmup (FutureSet)
     Website: http://box.rubyspace.net:5000/futureset
     - MindMup is a zero-friction mind map canvas.
     - This app is built base on Sinatra, depends on the MapJS javascript      
      canvas for client side rendering
     - It uses Google Drive and Amazon S3 AWS service to store maps.
9. Printable
     - This application lets customers create their printable orders with          
   various options about Stock, Size, Sides, Delivery Type, Proof Type, ...
     - Refactor code, reduce query with big data
10. CastleRock
     - Maintain admin page for website: https://www.castlerockreo.com
11. Shoplinkz
    Website: http://shoplinkz.com
    - Maintain some customization features
    - Create rake file to get profile page of stores in each page: savings.com,
retailmenot.com, coupons.com, ebates.com and save to database.
